00025 abstract class SApplication {
00026         protected $serverName;
00027         protected $serverPort;
00028         protected $serverSecure;
00029         protected $scriptPath;
00030         protected $scriptName;
00031         protected $pathInfo;    
00032         
00037         protected $home;
00041         protected $pageSearchDir;
00045         protected $gpPageName = 'p';
00049         protected $gpEventsName = 'e';
00053         protected $defaultPageName = 'default';
00057         protected $currentPage;
00061         protected $errorPageName = '404';
00066         protected $gp;
00067         
00074         function __construct() {
00075                 ob_start();
00076                 
00077                 $this->start_time = microtime();
00078                 $this->pageSearchDir = "{$this->home}/Pages";
00079                 
00080                 SALog::open();
00081                 SAUrl::setApplicationObject($this);
00082                 SAPageHandler::setApplicationObject($this);             
00083                 SARequest::setApplicationObject($this);
00084                 SARequest::init();              
00085                 SARequest::detectPageName();
00086                 SARequest::detectGETParameters();
00087                 
00088                 $this->gp = $_GET + $_POST;             
00089                 
00090                 session_name(SA_SESSION_NAME);
00091                 session_start();
00092                                 
00093                 try {
00094                         SARequest::checkValidity();
00095                 } catch (URLManipulationException $e) {
00096                         SALog::log($e->getMessage(), SA_LOG_ERROR);
00097                         $this->forward($this->errorPageName);
00098                 } catch (Exception $e) {
00099                         $this->resign($e->getMessage(), 1);
00100                 }
00101                 SALog::log("application initialized successfully", SA_LOG_NOTICE);
00102         }
00103         
00110         function __destruct() {
00111                 print '<p style="font-family:arial,helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:x-small">Powered by <a href="http://www.skyweb.ro/" target="_blank">SA PHP framework</a> - Execution time: ' . (microtime() - $this->start_time) . '</p>';
00112                 SALog::log("application shutdown", SA_LOG_NOTICE);
00113                 SALog::close();
00114                 ob_end_flush();         
00115         }
00116         
00123         function forward($page) {
00124                 SAPageHandler::handle($page);
00125                 $this->resign("forwarded to $page", 0);
00126         }
00127         
00134         public function redirect($url) {
00135                 header("Location: $url");
00136                 exit(0);
00137         }
00138         
00144         public function getServerName() {
00145                 return $this->serverName;
00146         }
00147         
00153         public function setServerName($serverName) {
00154                 $this->serverName = $serverName;
00155         }
00156         
00162         public function getServerPort() {
00163                 return $this->serverPort;
00164         }
00165         
00171         public function setServerPort($serverPort) {
00172                 $this->serverPort = $serverPort;
00173         }
00174         
00180         public function getServerSecure() {
00181                 return $this->serverSecure;
00182         }
00183         
00189         public function setServerSecure($secure) {
00190                 $this->serverSecure = $secure;
00191         }
00192         
00198         public function getPathInfo() {
00199                 return $this->pathInfo;
00200         }
00201         
00207         public function setPathInfo($pathInfo) {
00208                 $this->pathInfo = $pathInfo;
00209         }

00263         }

00300

00309         
00316         public function setCurrentPage(SAIPage &$page) {
00317                 $this->currentPage = &$page;
00318         }
00319         
00325         public function & getCurrentPage() {
00326                 return $this->currentPage;
00327         }
00328         
00334         public function run() {
00335                 $pageName = $this->GP($this->getGPPageName());
00336                 SAPageHandler::handle(($pageName) ? $pageName : $this->getDefaultPageName());
00337         }
00338         
00345         public function resign($message, $errorCode = 1) {
00346                 SALog::log($message, ($errorCode) ? SA_LOG_ERROR : SA_LOG_NOTICE);
00347                 exit($errorCode);
00348         }
00349         
00356         public function GP() {
00357                 $argc = func_num_args();
00358                 if ($argc == 0) return null;
00359                 $argv = func_get_args();
00360                 if ($argc == 2) {
00361                         $this->gp[$argv[0]] = $argv[1];
00362                 }
00363                 return $this->gp[$argv[0]];
00364         }
00365 }
